拥有者目前是可以通过VR设备到这个房子里面去体验入住的视觉感，还可以把自己买的这个数藏放在里面，当然你也可以在这里面冥想，听着是不是有点荒唐？

还有更荒唐的。

元宇宙里面的地产，他各个都这么火爆，饶舌歌手SNOOP DOGG

花费45万美元，买了一块虚拟土地，准备开发自己的史努比宇宙，狗爷也是可以的

香港房地产巨头，新世界发展集团行政总裁郑志刚也宣布买了沙盒中最大的那块数字地块，打造一个所谓的创新中心

据报道投资金额是500多万美金，还有我们都认识的林俊杰也曾经在Twitter上面说过，自己在Decentraland虚拟平台上，也拥有数字地块

这些地都不能住，那他们为什么要买这些玩意呢？

元宇宙地产具又一定的功能性，这部分我们先不提

一套数字房产能卖到300万，最重要的还是稀缺性，有钱人的钱拿来干嘛呢，机体的所有需求都已经满足了，就只能去竞争人类本身并不刚需的那些稀缺资源

The SandBox、DecenTraland数字地产上，堪称元宇宙里面的万科保利，他们空间的土地数量都是有限的，而且这两家公司都表示他们永远不会再创造更多的土地了

这些平台推出的地段通常几秒钟就被玩家和投资者抢购一空了，那些买不到的人就已经转头到OpenSea这种二级上面去买了，那么炒“数字房团”的人群，实力也的确是非常惊人的，OpenSea上许多的地块呢，几次转手价格就已经涨了好几倍了，所以不管你认不认可，跑马圈地的背后是对未来想象力的一种投资，所以元宇宙真的来了

title: Comprehensive Analysis of Eternal Word Project
body:
**面向對象**

區塊鏈遊戲愛好者

NFT 愛好者

區塊鏈領域的意見領袖

投資者在幣圈尋找機會

**背景分析**

2012年經歷了地球狗幣Go to the Moon（去月球）到地球狗滿天飛，GameFi（鏈遊戲）P2E（邊玩邊賺）賺錢挖錢，NFT（非同質代幣） ）無腦薄荷（鑄）撿錢，到肝白名單，到吐血，卻被割韭菜，行情變得血腥，盤子轉得飛快，稍不注意，就會變成鐮刀下的韭菜。

隨著鏈遊1.0的崩潰，鏈遊2.0的時代即將到來，人們將更加追求高質量的遊戲製作和遊戲體驗。

In next 5 years, there may come out about 1000 AAA crppto games on the market. Conservatively, 10% of these games will be successful, that is, 100 games will be successful, and each one will bring 1 million MAU (the average size of a decent F2P game), Conservatively there will be 100 million new crypto users, it's not complicated at all.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/URdyWfOAF_g8SNFFYDuDe.png?height=344&width=692)

3A Chain Game Layout of Top Crypto Investment Institutions

In the past year, crypto VCs have not stopped investing in this track because of the public's negative voices about chain games, and some project parties have begun to invest a lot of resources to create some "3A chain games". Judging from the current situation, the investment scale of encrypted investment institutions in chain games next only to public chain infrastructure.

A16z, Paradigm, Three Arrows Capital (Three Arrows Capital), Binance Labs and FTX (Alameda Research), the top crypto investment institutions we are familiar with that have all deployed some AAA chain games. In addition, Animoca Brands, a game development company, has also frequently appears in the list of investment institutions for chain game projects.

For example, A16z deployed Forte, Dapper Labs, Yuga Labs & Improbable, and Sky Mavis chain game teams, Paradigm deployed Sky Mavis and Parallel. Three Arrows Capital deployed Ultiverse and Ascenders, and Binance Labs deployed Sky Mavis And Ultiverse. FTX (Alameda Research) laid out Yuga Labs, Big Time and Star Atlas.

![A](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/8VNgucnko2leMCluSLtpk.jpg?height=2880&width=3840)

**Analysis purpose**

After participating in many blockchain games in the market, I found that most of them are so-called "mining games", which only have the speculative attributes of drumming and passing flowers, and there is no real in-depth game experience.

Eternal World is the first 3A Xianxia metaverse game I found in the world. Since many capitals are laying out the chain game track, I will use the whole article to analyze Eternal World to see if it can be grasped in 2022, a hundredfold return, and open dual channels of entertainment and wealth

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/qvaPe6KAoVx8SQKXmk812.jpg?height=1158&width=1697)

Before that, sprite also read a lot of bloggers' interpretations of web2 and web3 games. Many people will take the well-known King Glory as an example. King Glory players belong to consumption and pay to Tencent, but the money cannot be returned. In the eyes of people in the currency circle, there is no gold farming effect. But why does the King Glory live so well? The answer given by many bloggers is that it is fun and can bring spiritual enjoyment to people. I agree with this.

Next, these bloggers continued to give examples. If there is a 100% nano-replica web3 version of the King Glory, the gameplay is exactly the same as the glory of the king of web2, then now you spend 1,000 RMB to buy the skin, the skin first belongs to you, and then you can also slowly get pay back while playing. Most of this money is not given to Tencent, but is taken from players and used for players. So which would you choose?

The conclusion given by the bloggers is that everyone will prefer the Glory of the King of web3

But sprite don’t think so. At first glance, there is nothing wrong with it, but if you think about it carefully, you will find that there are many paradoxes in it.

I think it's more like a plate. People put money in first, and then get it back little by little over time. Even after getting the principal back, you can get more profits.

Isn't this the obvious plate play? The predecessors make money from the later players. Is this the so-called take from the players and use it for the players? Why don't the predecessors build the bridge, and the latter pay the bill?

I think everyone once defined the web3 game, don't forget the success of web2, there is its inevitability, we should not completely ignore the properties of web2 while thinking about web3

So what do I think a successful web3 game should look like?

There must be levels, and there must be big brothers! The big brother is the main consumer in the game. The charge money strength of the big brother in traditional games is beyond people's imagination. It does not mean that the big brother is a fat sheep, and the investment cannot be recovered. It's the big brother in the game, who usually buys time, efficiency, and sense of achievement with money.

They don't plan carefully, and how to operate will return the money faster. For the big brother in the game, they enjoy the pleasure of paying for the bill. The same time invested in the game to calculate the income, it is better to put it into their business and there will be a faster return. So big brother is here to buy pleasure with money

Last year, many chain games targeted those bosses and asked them to invest millions and tens of millions, claiming that they would pay back their money in a few days. That is pure nonsense. Will the real rich believe it? As a result, it collapsed, and some big brothers made money. Whose money did they make?

A big brother of who has millions of money may cut hundreds of ordinary players, or it may be another big brother. So we must return to human nature. The real big brother's position in the game is the consumer, and this is not the battlefield for them to make money. They come to the game to spend money to save time, improve efficiency and get pleasure! Don't listen to that nonsense that the more you invest, the more you get paid.

So why is there less and less big brother in web2 games now? Is the big brother unwilling to play games, or is the big brother old and no energy to play?

Actually no, games are an excellent field of spiritual pastime for modern people. With the opening of powerful social attributes, games have no age span. They are not children's play as we understand them. They have become the entry of major international capital running the track.

So does it mean that the current economic environment is poor, and the big brothers have no money? In fact, believe that sentence, the rich may have no money one day, but there will never be a shortage of rich people in this world. In fact, the real reason why the big brother is reluctant to continue playing the game is actually that he has less companionship. Big brother himself is in the game, there is no social interaction, no competition, no sense of honor, and naturally no desire to consume. Why is this?

Because a really fun game is often heavily involved, like the legends of web2, Paradise, and World of Warcraft in the past. Everyone needs to be immersed in games for a long time, but with the increasing pressure of life and the rapid development of the Internet era, in addition to games, other entertainment and pastimes have been born. For example, live broadcast is the most typical example. Now many people choose to watch live broadcast for spiritual entertainment in their free time. It may be easier to lie down and get pleasure than playing games.

So having said that, do we have a little inspiration? Why do games urgently switch from web2 to web3? Did the game project party Conscience discover it? Give back tens of millions of dollars in revenue to players every year?

NONONO, the cake of capital will not be easily cut out, they are more vicious than we imagined. The reason why we anxiously switch to WEB3 is because traditional web2 games cannot survive! The reason is that there is no accompany to play, anyway, they are not making money, there are too many channels for entertainment, no one wants to immerse in the game to get the pleasure.

So how do you get the player back into the game, money! Let's make money! Money is omnipotent, and money is the biggest driving force of people. Only by allowing us to truly earn money while playing games is the real web3 game.

In fact, here, everyone also understands that we ordinary people have a hidden identity in web3 games, that is, the accompany of the big brother. We play with it more, activate social interaction, increase game competition, and create a complete ecology with strong interaction and competition system, so that the big brother is naturally willing to consume. Taking the scene of the live broadcast room as an example, what kind of live broadcast room has a big brother spending, often with a large audience and a lot of interaction, whether you brush gifts or not, there are always people chatting and interacting with rhythm on the public screen, which will naturally attract big brothers to brush the list.

The open gang function of the game is a very good social means. The competition between gangs and gangs is accompanied by promotion of physique within the gang, allowing more ordinary players to form a group to make money. At the same time, I don't worry about the big brothers holding a group. It sounds ugly. Only the poor talk about holding a group. The rich are all competitive.

Just like in the live broadcast room, those spectators with a low wealth level are the easiest to form a group. Everyone also doesn’t buy gifts, and no one looks down on anyone. Let’s find a way to let the anchor give everyone more benefits, and stimulate the big brother to go to the anchor’s consumption. Reward, this virtually completes a closed loop. The anchor sings and dances to benefit ordinary players, and ordinary players tout the big brother and stimulate the big brother to spend on the anchor.

In this closed loop, each character gets what he wants. Among them, who is the most important? Some people say that the big brother is the most important, wrong! The most important one is the anchor. The anchor must have talent, so that ordinary players will be optimistic about your potential stock. The interaction of ordinary players with your likes is an investment. Who says we don’t invest without spending money? Our time and energy are all invested, and it is also about the cost of being a foil! When an anchor has information, there are players watching, such a live broadcast room will naturally attract big brothers

Therefore, in web3 games, the core is the game, and the target of the game is the anchor of the live broadcast room! Whether it is fun or not, and whether the design is reasonable or not, is the key to whether it can attract players.

We ordinary players are optimistic that your game is fun, and I believe that there will be more big brothers to consume, so we play it, so that we can make money.

So a good WEB3 game, I think it should have the following points

1. The core is to make the game playable, and then design a good economic model
2. Be friendly to us ordinary players, take care of us, and regard us as the core wealth of the game. We will naturally stimulate a lot of krypton gold players while playing and earning.
3. How to realize the consumption of big brother, this does not need to be explained too much, the game is the mapping of society, as long as there are people, there will be competition, where there is society, there will be people who want to have the right to speak, and more people will be born who are eager to make rules. The makers of the game, all these rights require competition, money is the only way to compete in the game, there is no need to worry about no big brother consumption
   Based on the points I have summarized above, I will now introduce this Eternal World in detail. It is what I have found so far, and it is the most representative work of web3 games in my heart. It has natural game attributes and a complete economic model. I have already seen web3 games. The time has come!

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/PTMBMO-VjOyOa8Hw1oWAk.png?height=1299&width=2482)

### Project Official Website

Open http://eternal-world.io/ official website of the game, you can see the introduction of the whole team

**Producer and main planner: Tavid Jaffe**

Graduated from Mountain Creek High School in suburban Birmingham, Alabama, and then attended the University of Southern California in Los Angeles. Known for directing the Chariots of Fire and God of War series. His "Carts of Fire: Darkness" and "God of War" have both been included in IGN's "TOP25 PS2 Games" ranking, of which "Cart of Fire: Darkness" ranked 9th, while "God of War" topped the list. In 2007, he left Sony Computer Entertainment (SCEA) in the United States and joined Eat Sleep Play, which signed a long-term agreement with Sony, to produce games for the PlayStation platform specially. In February 2012, Jaffe left Sleep and Eat due to creative disagreements. In 2014, Jaffe unveiled his first project, Draw to Die on PlayStation 4, at his new studio, Bartlett Jones Paranormal Detective Agency.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/LV0NfsroLTjAzZeiH_DkT.png?height=800&width=1280)

"Eternalworld" is the first Xianxia metaverse chain game produced by David Jaffe. He has poured all his years of game development experience into this product, and it will definitely be another creation after "God of War"

**Server Main Programmer:Adam**

He has held relevant positions in many top companies in the world such as Ubisoft France, EA, and Activision Blizzard. He has participated in the design and development of world-renowned game products such as "Warhammer OL", "Assassin's Creed", and "World of Warcraft"

**Client Main Programmer: Jasson**

He has more than ten years of experience in front-end development. He has worked in NCSoft and Yumeide in South Korea. He has deep understanding and operation ability of the Unity engine. As a principal develop member, his Legend sery online game achieved great success in the market. Among them, "MIR4" has exploded the market in South Korea and China, and has achieved great success in the field of chain games.

**Chief Game Graphic Designer: Aaron**

Majoring in fine arts and art at the British Academy of Art, has high attainments in game painting, 3D model, and TA technology field. He has worked in companies such as Activision Blizzard and Riot Games in the United States. He has participated in development and design of well-known games such as "Assassin's Creed",  "World of Warcraft" and "League of Legends". As well as served as art creative director of the legendary series of mobile games.

**Chief Technical Advisor: Vanessa**

Mainly responsible for the network security and operation and maintenance of games, graduated from the University of California, Berkeley, majoring in computer security, worked in Microsoft, Amazon and other top Internet companies, and then joined Amazon Game Company and participated in the operation of "Lost Ark" Work.

The super luxurious production team is one of the primary factors that I pay attention to, and then I will open the white paper to read the game introduction carefully.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7CPVuP_P_7RgKE6FsLez0.jpg?height=3840&width=3840)

Open White Book

[http://eternal-world.io/eternalworld.pdf](http://eternal-world.io/eternalworld.pdf)

There is a complete game project introduction, I will sort out some for you

Eternal world is the world's first 3A Xianxia metaverse game.Real GameFi 2.0 I can understand

At the beginning of Eternal World, there are four occupations to choose from. Everyone can have the three occupations of self, meta-god and avatar at the same time, and they can switch freely without logging out.Meta-gods can have 2 career choices and avatars have 4 career choices.There are a total of 10 classes, including self, meta-god and avatar, and you can configure talent points to gain another 10 classes, making a total of 20 classes.Each class has its own combat orientation during the game. Super social, integrated country, sect, guild, private chat and other multiple social systems. There are many occupations, twenty kinds of Xianxia occupations, to satisfy all your fantasies about cultivating immortals.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/okwBTBfI1q0gKjRE4zVdM.jpg?height=1180&width=2400)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ByBWrCP8j7rTEZWz9zKsC.jpg?height=1180&width=2400)

**Oversized Map**

Super large world frame design, there are nearly 100 copies of maps from the ten directions

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/qL_4c6wbSFu4kGKnA4CoG.png?height=1158&width=1697)

**Super Cool Equipment**

Thousands of artifacts and equipment, let you hold them, and traverse Xianxia metaverse.

**Ultra Clear Picture Quality**

First 3A Xianxia Yuanyu game in the world

3A games are used to refer to those high-quality games with high development costs, long development cycles, and high resource consumption that are produced "regardless of the cost to the extent that a company can be dragged down." The development cost of well-known stand-alone games such as "The Witcher 3" and "Grand Theft Auto 4" is close to 100 million US dollars, and it takes 3-5 years for a development team of nearly 1,000 people to create a fun 3A game.

**Featured gameplay**

In the game, there are conventional games such as PVE dungeon, PVP competition, dart betting, etc., and many novel special games have been added.

•  In the game, the frame design of the super-large world is carried out, and there are nearly 100 copies of maps in the ten directions

• There are thousands of spirit beasts, mounts, boss, elites, monsters, tens of thousands of equipment, wings, feather wheels, fashion, tattoos, etc. in the game•

The game contains all kinds of fun daily activities, weekly activities and oath activities, including 60, 200, 400 and 800 large, medium and small multiplayer team battles, sect wars, national wars and other confrontation activities  
  
 **Project Highlights**

1. Closed-loop economy, deflationary model
2. Large and deep MMORPG
3. Free mode, free to play
4. Diversified PK system, mature model of national war
5. Complete in-game economic system,free or charge to play
6. Create a real fairy tale universe
7. A blend of WEB2 and WEB3 players

**Token Model 
  ETL allocation rules** 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/cAKNfV2Bunga-EkBulrme.png?height=551&width=987)

NFT pledged mining output 15% (released in 12 months): 150 million

Game output 75%: 750 million

Market liquidity 2%: 20 million

Institutional investment 8%: 80 million

TGE price: 0.02U

Deflation mechanism: 85% of the ETL recharged in the game is destroyed, and 15% is injected into the development fund

**Economic Cycle Model**

Get spirit stones by participating in game activities Use Spirit Stones to auction black gold in-game Black gold can be exchanged for ETL at a ratio of 1:1

You can buy spirit stones by recharging ETL in the game

Such a complete economic cycle model, coupled with the ultimate deflation mechanism. It really avoided the death spiral of the so-called "digging, selling" of chain games.(The white book also introduces more detailed gameplay of Genesis NFT)

**NFT proportional distribution:：**

NFT is the inheritance of the immortals of Eternal world. It is a creation token and can be pledged for mining.The total number of NFTs issued is 300,000, and the team retains 20%

Synthesis requires 2 NFTs of the same level to synthesize, and the synthesis rate of different levels is different. A failure to synthesize destroys an NFT, which creates a massive deflation. The higher the level of NFT, the lower the probability of synthesis, but at the same time the benefits will be super amplified

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/VuTRdZbS-gJO8NpAemP8k.png?height=551&width=987)

Level 1 and Level 2 NFTs can get in-game airdrop blind boxes and game consumption spirit stones

NFTs above level 3 can not only get in-game airdrop blind boxes, but also pledge mining tokens. A total of 15% of the tokens can be obtained through NFT pledge. The higher the level of NFT, the more tokens obtained by pledge.

In addition to obtaining pledge tokens, level 5 NFTs also have exclusive monster spawning maps in the game scene. I think this gameplay is very novel and user-friendly. It has both the randomness of NFT blind box opening and the multi-functional properties of synthesis.

Players who have been drawn to Level 1 and Level 2 NFTs in this way, if they do not want to enter the game to play, can also synthesize Level 3 NFTs to pledge and mine tokens. The highest-level 5-level NFT can only be obtained through synthesis, which will keep the floor price of low-level NFTs rising.

The selling price of the blind box is only 10U, allowing more players to lower the threshold to participate. At the same time, the number of Level 5 NFTs is limited. When Level 5 NFTs have been synthesized and saturated, players can only buy from each other in the secondary market.

而下面的氪金遊戲玩家，如果想進入專屬地圖PK爭奪裝備，只能從前期有NFT的持有者那裡購買。買。這真正讓傳統遊戲玩家學會了區塊鏈操作，也讓玩家手中的 NFT 在區塊鏈中獲得了更有價值的支持。這種股權 NFT 真的很值錢

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/VPWHGx8Hxsn-I97LVy4JA.jpg?height=1158&width=1697)

Sprite 真的是這樣的 NFT 是認為值得參與和擁有的，無論從炒作價值還是長期持有和權益的角度來看。

打造出今年第一款好俠客為主題的3A大作，是海外玩家世界獨一無二的獨特風格。的大型連鎖遊戲。NFT強烈推薦參與。項目方不為自己保留代幣。選擇持有NFT一起上線，是為了讓遊戲能夠長久地做下去。NFT是質押獲取代幣，還是市場更新，都有非常大的增值空間。交易是可以充滿高回報的優質項目，千萬不能錯過！

title: OP生态一览 ——社区贡献
body:
补充： 写到一半，6月9号得知Op一手好牌打得稀巴烂，什么幺蛾子都发生了。 真jb无语，L2猪猪对手， 隔壁的 Arb 和 ZK 都在看戏， OP 继续演啊，刷新三观，就tm离谱。

前言： 本篇文章主要从 我个人的视角出发，去看项目。

从项目的社区去看， 我偏向于做社区贡献这一方面。这适合 个人 去撸，同时能学到不少东西，无他，做项目方的，不管多垃圾，至少比我牛，多多少少能学到一些，也能体会到项目方做决策的出发点和落脚点。

```
  举个栗子： Exswap 的社区Admit ，@endygamie 老弟是个18岁处男，韩国人，他喜欢在自己推特发瑟瑟，搞 CosPlay， 在discord，总能看到项目方在打游戏 ，听歌。 他也懂：咋们调侃的，“项目方在做事” 这句话是啥意思哈哈。 有一次我问他，项目啥时候空投？他说：团队目前没有经费请 审计， 审计很忙，并且收取很高的费用，还要再缓一缓，然后发了几张聊天截图给我看，嗯，好像还真是这么回事。。  
```

Across的项目方很喜欢开会，早些时候一个晚上三次会议，分开来开会，chat to eran 模式摸熟了，早期进厂吃肉，后期进厂割肉。 最近也快空投了，有社区贡献。可试。

Pyme 的项目方原来是在漂亮国某个州 开 暑假夏令营的，嗅觉到web3的工作岗位这一块有巨大的人才空缺，转而干 web3， 因为项目方胡子多，下面简称为 大胡子哥。 大胡子哥每周会写一篇关于web3的文章，有关于求职的，有关于他个人感悟的，他本身就已经坚持写文章，有几年了，稳定输出，一般人还真坚持不了。

红利仍然存在：
能如此便捷地跨越距离，时差，和别人一起共事。很快融入一个国际化团队，这在我以前是难以想象的。一个项目干完就跑路，或者同时干十几个项目，拿十几个项目的薪水，空投，这也是难以想象的。 所以 趁着 有时间赶紧肝， 废话不多说了，进入正题。

## DAO 板块: （我喜欢DAO）

出实际利益出发，DAO的可操作空间最大,也是拿最多钱的板块.

我讨厌人情社会，但绝大多数项目， 凡事总须研究，才会明白。 是要靠人情关系网，才能 走捷径，更快地拿社区贡献身份，拿空投资格，拿白名单。 利益交换，无可厚非。

自己没有渠道怎么办？ ：靠实力做贡献，积极舔，主动私聊项目方，摆弄姿态表忠心。这一渠道仍然可行。

区块链的双刃剑：半匿名 。    越是国际化的项目，越是如此，项目方不熟悉你是什么牛头马面，越是需要你积极表现， active

title: Build blockchain warehouse with Datawaves ETL
body:
Nowadays, Web3 startup teams have increasingly complex needs for handling blockchain data and are no longer satisfied with just building dashboards. For example, build machine learning models to serve prediction or recommendation scenarios, run graph analysis algorithms to find abnormal transaction addresses, or provide metrics data for upper-layer business. Whichever of the above methods means one must build a blockchain warehouse based on on-chain data.

But building a stable, easy-to-use blockchain warehouse is no easy task. `ethereum-etl` and `ethereum-etl-airflow` are two excellent open-source projects. Users can get full volume data directly through `ethereum-etl` and build a pipeline of T+1 data through `ethereum-etl-airflow`. However, having them alone is just half of the story.

## Build blockchain warehouse with open-source components

![Build Ethereum data warehouses with open-source ecosystems](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/J75NZMyNBNm4Kq5z1fchB.png?height=1152&width=2795)

This is a complete data processing pipeline:

* The user first needs an EVM node with all-history data and access to trace data (which is expensive)
* The data is then regularly synchronized to the data warehouse via `ethereum-etl-airflow` and subsequently decodes contracts.
  * `ethereum-etl-airflow` is an excellent library for most data extract and transformation needs. Still, one huge problem is that it is bound to the compute engine and currently only fully supports BigQuery requirements. So if you're not using Google Cloud, you'll need to re-implement the operator and contract decode logic.
  * Once the number of contract events/functions that need to be decoded rises to a certain level, it's not easy to keep these tasks scheduled and completed on time. Usually, the pipeline maintainer needs to have sufficient experience in Airflow and Kubernetes.
* Finally, the user will need to have another transform project to translate the activities emitted by the smart contract and model the upper-level business logic.

## Build blockchain warehouse with Datawaves ETL

![Build Ethereum data warehouses with Datawaves ETL](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3eJK2hfYeI4_QbDpplg77.png?height=1296&width=2913)

We are building **[Datawaves ETL](https://datawaves.xyz/etl)**, which integrates multiple standardized components to provide the ability to automatically synchronize data into the user's data warehouse, providing directly:

* EVM raw data (e.g., `transactions`, `traces`, `logs`, etc.)
* decoded contract data (e.g. `erc721_evt_transfer`, `opensea_WyvernExchangeV2_call_atomicMatch_` etc.)

The user only needs to provide the data warehouse connection URL, and cloud file system (e.g., AWS S3) configuration. And then, the cloud server can directly access and transform the data needed by the user into the user's data warehouse or s3 bucket daily and create tables in the data warehouse. It has the following advantages:

* You don't need to buy a node with all history and access to traces data (in QuickNode, this costs $500+/month)
* Extract the total amount of raw data very quickly at a meager cost (in QuickNode, it would be close to $2000+, with a higher machine cost to achieve a similar speed to ours)
  * QuickNode charges for the number of requests after the exceeded plan, and there is no batch extracting of traces in the EVM Node interface, so this data is costly to extract.
  * Because we already have data compressed using columnar storage, the block file is smaller and has fewer files to be transferred faster.
* Eliminating the need to maintain the underlying data ETL pipeline, which is standardized and tedious, leaving this to a cloud service that devotes more resources to work on the data movement and smart contract decoding, so your team can deliver business insights faster.
* The Airflow that schedules these tasks is cumbersome to maintain, and the more contracts that need to be decoded, the more tasks there are for the entire Airflow. Keeping an Airflow on the Kubernetes cluster with thousands of tasks running can also be a pain.
* Save the type design and namespace design work. We found many types of accuracy issues in building our data warehouse. These experiences are packaged in a complete solution for the user to use, and the user gets clean data that is the easiest to use in its data warehouse.
* Execution speed is essential in contract decoding. When there are thousands of events/functions to decode every day, it is not easy to ensure that the data is ready before the user uses it. Saving time in developing automated contract decoding tools, in the solution, we provide automated contract decoding tools that are 100 times faster than libraries like `web3.py`.
  * We have rewritten the entire decoding process in Java in the Spark engine, enabling a speedup of hundreds of times over the python implementation in high concurrency scenarios.

If you’d like to play with Datawaves ETL, join our [waitlist](https://forms.gle/PSKJApvsjAvetA1r6), and ask any questions in [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/22sQjRuYHR).

title: Our NFTX Vault; an intro
body:
The Vault is an NFTX-hosted vault that allows you to deposit your Pixlton NFTs in return for the PIXLS token. This token is tradeable on SushiSwap for Ethereum. The Vault tracks the floor value of Pixlton, which allows people who are looking to sell their Pixltonians to always be able to sell at floor price into The Vault. Because other NFT collectors can also buy from The Vault, this creates a liquidity pool that is always able to give you the floor value for your Pixltonians right then and there as opposed to listing them on OpenSea and having to wait for a buyer.

You can find our Vault here: <https://nftx.io/vault/0xf8eb56c7e4e3c885c905a19583bf41644d35aa0a/info/>

## Buying Pixltonians from The Vault

To buy Pixltonians from The Vault you will first need some ETH. After visiting our Vault using the URL above you can pick any Pixltonian you’d like to have. Buying from The Vault also incurs a slight fee. There are two ways you can buy from The Vault: — Random redeem (1% fee, NFTX decides at random which Pixl you will get) — Targeted redeem (5% fee, You decide which Pixltonian you want at a slight premium)

If you want to do a random redeem, you can hit the “Redeem” in the dialog on the right side of the screen and indicate how many Pixltonians you want to buy. By subsequently hitting “Redeem” you will broadcast the transaction to the blockchain and once approved you will be the proud owner of a random Pixltonian. Randomly redeeming requires PIXLS token, which can be bought on Sushiswap using the dialog presented to you when redeeming.

If you want to do a targeted buy, simply click the Pixltonian you want to buy, click it so it becomes selected, and click “Buy Now”.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/v4L4ArrvkDGr4CNl-2euq.png?height=239&width=700)

## Selling your Pixltonians into the Vault

To sell your Pixltonians into The Vault, you will need to go to the “Sell” tab. Choose one or more Pixlton NFTs and choose the “Sell Now” option. You may need to approve your Pixltonian for spending first. The dialog on the right will tell you how many ETH you will receive when selling into the vault. After hitting “Approve” in your Metamask, the transaction will be broadcasted and once it’s approved on the blockchain your Pixltonian will be sold into The Vault. *This means they are no longer yours and others can start to buy them from The Vault.*

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/XYkUmUGaA2kdcO5rzG0Lp.png?height=259&width=700)

## Staking your Pixltonians

Alternatively, you can also stake NFTX’s PIXLS token for rewards. When looking at the Vault choose the “Stake” tab to immediately stake your Pixltonians into the pool. By staking them you get rewarded in PIXLS token, which will allow you to redeem Pixlton NFTs from The Vault. Staking does **NOT** incur a fee as it supports the ecosystem around The Vault. Staking your Pixltonians **DOES** mean that you’re essentially selling it off in favor of the PIXLS token. Others will be able to buy your staked Pixlton NFTs.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/fXDZleAl4-Ewmfqtl0qou.png?height=247&width=700)

title: Introducing: the Pixlton Identity Creator
body:
Our original project has always hugged that fine line between an avatar project and a PFP project. Due to their square size, they fit just fine as a PFP, but being full body makes them less than optimal for that. In the past, we’ve released our *“now suited for avatar”* variations of all of our Pixltonians but that was still kind of limited to what we had created. To finally scratch that PFP itch, we’re now releasing the Pixlton Identity Creator (PIC)!

## What is it?

The PIC is a [new tool on our website](https://getpixls.com/pic) that allows you to connect to your wallet and create custom banners and avatars out of your Pixltonians. Simply drag one or more of your favorite citizens onto the canvas, select a background, and export the image. We currently support:

* Avatar format (square 1:1)
* Banner format (landscape 3:1)

Both should be perfectly suitable for Twitter and most other socials! The PIC comes with a few pre-determined backgrounds, created by all kinds of different artists. Some of them have even been graciously provided by other projects such as **Animetas** and Bitlectro’s **Dreamers**. Big thanks to them for being willing to do so!

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/e-K6K6-Hg-WlnmP0JQp5-.png?height=233&width=700)

Currently, the PIC supports the Genesis Pixls collection, but once we release the Pixlton Car Club we’ll be sure to integrate the cars too. That way you can show off your Pixltonians and their rides all in one awesome banner!

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/kOF00FuWoqC2f4gMzv3JG.png?height=500&width=500)

## Get started today!

Create your own cool avatars and banners and show them off, today! Feel free to tag us on Twitter when you show off your creations and we’ll be happy to RT them. Happy tinkering!

title: 总结#AcrossV2 的发布
body:
官方英文全文链接：<https://medium.com/across-protocol/summing-up-acrossv2s-launch-c2ee5145d4ed>

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/S_LGk3qmr7Q6tkN-h9G7a.png?height=350&width=630)

*Across 社区经理 Lana 详细介绍了 Across V2 发布的所有阶段，包括迁移、发布、进展情况（+ 统计数据）等等。*

5 月对于 Across Protocol 来说是一个非常忙碌的时期。我们一直在为我们的 V2 发布做准备！

一系列活动的顺序计划如下：

🐦 宣布 V2 流动性迁移

📣 宣布 V2 功能

🔓 开放迁移

🎉 发布日派对！

🚀 推出 V2

🗣️ 跟进 Spaces 活动

**系好安全带 — — 让我们回顾一下。**

🐦 宣布 V2 流动性迁移

作为一个团队，我们努力在各方面使 Across 尽可能易于使用。例如：我们简单的 UI界面、透明的费用展示和深入介绍V2的 Medium 文章这些都可以体现（这里仅举几例）。Across V2 迁移也不例外。

[我们在发布前 2 周发布了一篇关于如何迁移的文章](https://medium.com/across-protocol/lps-migrate-liquidity-from-v1-to-v2-screenshots-and-faqs-8616150b3396)。这使我们能够回答有关为什么需要迁移以及如何进行迁移的任何问题，并确保我们在重要的日子之前拥有尽可能多的曝光率。

我们的设计负责人甚至制作了倒计时图片来不断提醒大家，〜很有风格。〜

[https://twitter.com/AcrossProtocol/status/1526634917769232385/photo/1?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1526634917769232385%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Facrossprotocol%2Fstatus%2F1526634917769232385image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07](https://twitter.com/AcrossProtocol/status/1526634917769232385/photo/1?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1526634917769232385%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Facrossprotocol%2Fstatus%2F1526634917769232385image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07)

这些一系列的准备工作使我们能够在 Across 上获得最大的可见性，以确保人们在发布前一天打开该窗口时就会意识到并准备好迁移。

📣 宣布 V2 功能

5 月 18 日，我们宣布了 V2 的功能。我们让我们敏锐的高级工程师 John 和大胆的数据科学家 Chase 仔细研究了发布的每一个元素。

请参阅下面的Spaces摘要,由我的（美丽且自定义编辑的）冒险时间讲述:

如果您想完整收听 Spaces 活动，请单击[此处](https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1DXxyDaXPNEJM)。如果您想要快速总结，请阅读下文。

**回顾一下，Across V2…**

**…支持 L2 到 L2 传输。**

使用#AcrossV2，您可以轻松地在 L2 之间桥接（我们不只是这么说说）。高级工程师 John 进行了 L2 之间桥接之旅，总共花费了 5 分钟，以及 0.001 ETH 的gas费和桥接费用。

[https://twitter.com/jdshutt/status/1529123127149531137?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1529123127149531137%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fjdshutt%2Fstatus%2F1529123127149531137image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07](https://twitter.com/jdshutt/status/1529123127149531137?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1529123127149531137%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fjdshutt%2Fstatus%2F1529123127149531137image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07)

**…支持一个新的链，polygon**

现在可以使用 [Across V2 与Polygon 进行往返桥接传输](https://across.to/)。

**…具有难以置信的资本效率**

Across V2 使用许多不同的机制来确保它具有令人难以置信的资本效率。通过使用净额、“及时”流动性、批处理/捆绑和我们的中心辐射模型，我们能够实现高资本效率，您会在使用 Across 时注意到增加的功能。

您可以在此处阅读有关我们[提高资本效率的更多信息](https://medium.com/across-protocol/a-sneak-peek-into-across-v2-2b4d0bd95b97)。

**… 支持部分资金池**

在 Across V2 中，中继器现在能够支持部分资金池的执行。这对我们的中继器和用户都有好处。

在下面的剪辑中，高级工程师John谈到了部分资金池为中继器带来的赚钱机会。

[https://twitter.com/AcrossProtocol/status/1532444439997603840?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1532444439997603840%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Facrossprotocol%2Fstatus%2F1532444439997603840image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07](https://twitter.com/AcrossProtocol/status/1532444439997603840?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1532444439997603840%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Facrossprotocol%2Fstatus%2F1532444439997603840image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07)

Across数据科学家Chase在下一个剪辑中谈到了用户如何从部分填充中受益。

[https://twitter.com/AcrossProtocol/status/1534256380797825024?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1534256380797825024%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Facrossprotocol%2Fstatus%2F1534256380797825024image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07](https://twitter.com/AcrossProtocol/status/1534256380797825024?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1534256380797825024%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Facrossprotocol%2Fstatus%2F1534256380797825024image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07)

**…保持我们的低费用承诺**

V2 带来了额外的功能以及同样的低费用。您仍然可以被我们（非常）低的费用所震撼。哦，还有一个新的图形来展示它！

[https://twitter.com/AcrossProtocol/status/1532818151183818752?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1532818151183818752%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Facrossprotocol%2Fstatus%2F1532818151183818752image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07](https://twitter.com/AcrossProtocol/status/1532818151183818752?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1532818151183818752%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Facrossprotocol%2Fstatus%2F1532818151183818752image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07)

**…不牺牲安全性**

安全是 Across 价值观的重中之重，我们知道这是我们用户的首要考虑。Across V2 不会牺牲功能的安全性。[Across V2](https://blog.openzeppelin.com/uma-across-v2-audit/)由 OpenZeppelin 全面审核。

V2 也继续受到 UMA 乐观预言机的保护。您可以在此处阅读有关 Across 安全性的更多信息，并在[此处](https://medium.com/across-protocol/a-deep-dive-into-across-protocols-security-c9b46a217b3b)阅读V2 特征。

您可以通过阅读我们的V2 文章深入了解 AcrossV2 的所有功能。

```
‘在 V2 发布的前一天，整个房子里，每个人都在激动 — — 看！无线鼠标。

代码被小心地挂在区块链上，希望#AcrossV2 很快就会出现。
```

🔓 迁移开启

迁移在发布前一天开始。迁移足够的流动性对于启动 Across V2 至关重要。我们团队的技术成员相信，前一天是迁移的最佳时间，他们是对的。

到我们V2即将上线的时候，有2300万美元从USDC池迁移到 V2池，从 WETH 池迁移了4600 WETH到V2池

🎉 发布日派对！

当 Across 团队准备迁移和发布时，Across 社区正在计划一个非常详细的 24 小时派对。下面的推特线程说明了社区派对的每一个活动。

[https://twitter.com/AcrossProtocol/status/1528934724298846208?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1528934724298846208%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Facrossprotocol%2Fstatus%2F1528934724298846208image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07](https://twitter.com/AcrossProtocol/status/1528934724298846208?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1528934724298846208%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Facrossprotocol%2Fstatus%2F1528934724298846208image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07)

社区做了一项令人难以置信的工作，为他们计划的多项活动和活动召集了大量的人 — — 看看那条推文上的参与度！

社区的这一令人难以置信的努力进一步提高了对 Across V2 发布的认识。它还教我们如何制作完美的红色天鹅绒纸杯蛋糕！

### 🚀 发布V2

随着社区派对的进行，时间越来越接近 V2 的发布。发射时间定于 5 月 24 日下午 3:00 UTC 在Across Discord 进行。

在我不断与工程师进行检查之后，我得到了好消息 — 系统已经准备就绪。

我们发布了一个完全由我们的社区构建的按钮。人们可以按下我们的启动按钮，分享他们正在帮助启动 V2（以价值 1000 美元的 ACX 参与抽奖活动）。

附带说明：我们有超过 1000 名唯一用户点击了 V2 启动按钮。感谢您帮助我们推出Across！

大约在发布前 15 分钟，每个人都跳进了 Across Discord，按下了官方的红色大按钮，这将启动 Across V2 及其所有荣耀！

3…2…1…起飞！V2 发布。

[https://twitter.com/AcrossProtocol/status/1529117007043493889?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1529117007043493889%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Facrossprotocol%2Fstatus%2F1529117007043493889image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07](https://twitter.com/AcrossProtocol/status/1529117007043493889?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1529117007043493889%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Facrossprotocol%2Fstatus%2F1529117007043493889image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07)

这座桥按计划运行 — — 它速度快、资金效率高且安全。V2 处理了across（呵呵）它的新桥接量，我们都非常累但是超级兴奋，因为 Across V2 已经启动并成功运行。

给你一些统计数据：

在撰写本文时（6 月 7 日），Across V2自发布之日起已拥有约 9,000 名新用户和约 3,000 万美元的总交易量。

具体而言，自推出以来，往返于 Polygon（我们最新添加的链）的总交易量约为 450 万美元，L2 到 L2 之间传输的桥梁总交易量约为 1000 万美元。

自 V2 推出以来，我们的Across桥交易量增加了 50%。

您，我们的用户，是 Across V2 发布如此成功的原因。我们感谢你们所有人 — — 感谢您使用 Across。

### 🗣️ 空间活动

在V2发布后，我们继续和我们集成的链项目方之间举办推特空间活动。

您现在收听我们以前（和[Boba](https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1nAKEYZvPqRKL?s=20)、[Optimism](https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1yNGaYpDqjDGj?s=20)和[Polygon](https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1mrxmarrQyqxy?s=20)）的空间。

请留意我们即将举办的更多 Spaces 活动。我们通常在 [Twitter](https://twitter.com/AcrossProtocol)和[Discord](https://discord.gg/across) 上发布这些公告。

在 V2 上，咖啡、红牛、Spaces 活动、社区努力和大量开发工作的旋风席卷了整个 V2。再次感谢所有帮助我们发布 Across V2 的人，感谢我们的用户使用它！

如需更多与 V2 相关的内容，请关注我们的 [Twitter](https://twitter.com/AcrossProtocol)，深入了解我们的 [Medium](https://medium.com/across-protocol)和[Discord](https://discord.gg/across)，并查看我们[全新的 V2 文档](https://docs.across.to/v2/)。

title: OP生态一览 ——社区贡献
body:
前言： 本篇文章主要从 我个人的视角出发，去看项目。

从项目的社区去看， 我偏向于做社区贡献这一方面。这适合 个人 去撸，同时能学到不少东西，无他，做项目方的，不管多垃圾，至少比我牛，多多少少能学到一些，也能体会到项目方做决策的出发点和落脚点。

```
  举个栗子： Exswap 的社区Admit ，@endygamie 老弟是个18岁处男，韩国人，他喜欢在自己推特发瑟瑟，搞 CosPlay， 在discord，总能看到项目方在打游戏 ，听歌。 他也懂：咋们调侃的，“项目方在做事” 这句话是啥意思哈哈。 有一次我问他，项目啥时候空投？他说：团队目前没有经费请 审计， 审计很忙，并且收取很高的费用，还要再缓一缓，然后发了几张聊天截图给我看，嗯，好像还真是这么回事。。  
```

Across的项目方很喜欢开会，早些时候一个晚上三次会议，分开来开会，chat to eran 模式摸熟了，早期进厂吃肉，后期进厂割肉。 最近也快空投了，有社区贡献。可试。

Pyme 的项目方原来是在漂亮国某个州 开 暑假夏令营的，嗅觉到web3的工作岗位这一块有巨大的人才空缺，转而干 web3， 因为项目方胡子多，下面简称为 大胡子哥。 大胡子哥每周会写一篇关于web3的文章，有关于求职的，有关于他个人感悟的，他本身就已经坚持写文章，有几年了，稳定输出，一般人还真坚持不了。

红利仍然存在：
能如此便捷地跨越距离，时差，和别人一起共事。很快融入一个国际化团队，这在我以前是难以想象的。一个项目干完就跑路，或者同时干十几个项目，拿十几个项目的薪水，空投，这也是难以想象的。 所以 趁着 有时间赶紧肝， 废话不多说了，进入正题。

## DAO 板块: （我喜欢DAO）

出实际利益出发，DAO的可操作空间最大,也是拿最多钱的板块.

我讨厌人情社会，但绝大多数项目， 凡事总须研究，才会明白。 是要靠人情关系网，才能 走捷径，更快地拿社区贡献身份，拿空投资格，拿白名单。 利益交换，无可厚非。

自己没有渠道怎么办？ ：靠实力做贡献，积极舔，主动私聊项目方，摆弄姿态表忠心。这一渠道仍然可行。

区块链的双刃剑：半匿名 。    越是国际化的项目，越是如此，项目方不熟悉你是什么牛头马面，越是需要你积极表现， active

币圈有句话叫做： 做自己的研究： DYOR在这里，我提出一个新的词汇： BYOC 打造你自己的人设。

不扯皮了，上干柴烈火！

1\. [Boring DAO](https://www.boringdao.com/)    多链解决方案， 由DAO驱动的跨链 项目正如它的名字，有点无聊？已发币。
